1.4.name: wordpress/wp-multibox
1.4.description:
The Multibox script by phatfusion, further improved by Liam Smart is probably the best lightbox option within the MooTools framework. It handles images, flash video and swf, ajax and remote html, realmedia, windows media, pdf and mp3 playback, with automatic slideshows. Colors, borders and custom icon folder could be set directly on the settings page.

Since the first porting of the script as a WordPress plugin, by Manfred Rutschmann, is no longer updated, this release is purposed to load the script with wp_enqueue_script function in order to avoid conflicts. In addition, inline elements, Ajax requests and the latest MooTools framework version 1.3 are supported!

Plugin Homepage and Demo
